Our mission
To create a powerful automation system empowering Amazon sellers to scale sustainably with precise control over their advertising workflow.

Meet the team

Luke Lim
Chief Executive Officer
Luke Lim
Chief Executive Officer

Luke graduated with a first-class honors degree in Information Technology.

In 2015, he started selling on Amazon full time, launching 3 brands and 19 products in the USA in 3 years and generating multiple 7-figures in sales.

In 2018, Luke started building Scale Insights from scratch, with the goal to create a customizable AI engine for sellers to automate their advertising strategies.

Leslie Chong
Chief Operating Officer
Leslie Chong
Chief Operating Officer

Leslie ChongChief Operating Officer Leslie graduated with Bachelor in Engineering (Hons), starting his career in corporate finance then into entrepreneurship.

He found his foothold in online performance marketing and has been invited to esteemed conferences in USA and Europe to share his experiences

He has successfully built 7-figure eCommerce brand with his partner in the toys & kids product niche and acquired by a US based private equity firm.

He has also co-founded an eCommerce education academy which has coached close to 3000 students to start their private label brands

Daniel Lai
Head of Seller Engagement
Daniel Lai
Head of Seller Engagement

Driven by the mission to empower individuals and businesses, Daniel has been in the forefront of driving innovations and delivering real-time skillsets in the Ecommerce space.

Together with his partner, they co-founded multiple Eccommerce brands which have consistently delivered 7 figure annual sales since 2017.

Daniel devotes majority of his time in the education sector of the business, with an active cohort of over 3000 sellers across 5 major cities.

Daniel is also the lead spokesperson for the company’s Ecommerce software technologies which equip Ecommerce sellers with the best tools to scale their businesses effectively in the shortest possible time.

Ivan Ong
Partner
Ivan Ong
Partner

Ivan started out as a solo affiliate marketer since 2007. He was approached by many to learn his methodology, which led him to become a public speaker and coach.

Ivan went on to list the company on ASX and raised a total of AUD14mil.

In 2017, Ivan co-founded his D2C brand. It has since grown to become an 8-figure brand with presence in 12 countries.

He has also been invited to share about his eCommerce success at numerous esteemed Masterminds around the globe, including the USA, Canada and Asia.

Davion Wong
Partner
Davion Wong
Partner

Davion graduated with a Bachelor of Engineering (Hons) in civil engineering, starting his career in a large government agency, eventually spearheading their research arm.

In 2008, he commenced his entrepreneurial journey as an internet marketer and soon started generating a healthy 6-figure annual profits.

In 2016, Davion started selling on Amazon, launching 2 brands that generated over $10 million USD.

Davion is the research scientist behind Scale Insights, fine-tuning their algorithms, shaping their automation system, and designing the AI with the goal to help brand owners scale their sales profitably on Amazon.

How are automated ASINs calculated?

Spend wisely

Scale Insights subscription plan charges based on the number of automated ASINs you need.
1
Automated ASINs are based on what you automate, not the number of ASINs you have

If you have 1000 ASINs but only want automation for 3 ASINs, then you only need 3 automated ASINs.

2
Automated ASINs are based on the ad group's associated ASIN

If you only have the ASIN B000000001 in an ad group, Scale Insights will set that as the associated ASIN.
If you enable automation for the B000000001, you can automate this ad group and any other ad groups associated with this ASIN.

To automate an ad group with multiple variations, you must manually set an associated ASIN for the ad group, then enable automation for the associated ASIN.

To automate multiple ad groups associated with the same ASIN, you only need 1 automated ASIN for that ASIN.

3
One automated ASIN allows you to automate one ASIN in one marketplace

To automate 1 ASIN in the US and the same ASIN in CA, you need 2 automated ASINs.
